name: Amivie
specialty: In-Home Care and I/DD Support Services
location: East Coast, including NC, OH, FL

primary: Individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities

brand_mission: To provide compassionate, individualized in-home and community-based care that empowers clients to live with dignity, independence, and support across every stage of life.
slogan: Bringing the care you need to live in the place you love.
tagline: The Right Care. The Right Person.

do: Highlight caregiver-client matchmaking and continuity of care
Reinforce accreditation and low turnover as trust signals
donot: Do not refer to clients as 'patients'
Do not refer to Amivie as a 'clinic' or 'practice'
Avoid generic promises without proof or trust signals

clinical_strengths: Minimally invasive onboarding for clients and families
philosophical_strengths: Individualized care plans tailored to each client
Client dignity and independence come first
Deep supervisor involvement and feedback loops
Focus on emotional and social wellbeing, not just physical needs
organizational_strengths: Nonprofit partnership with Community Concepts Foundation

topic_targeting: Balance condition-focused and service-focused content; alternate between senior home care and I/DD support to appeal to both sides of the audience equally.
procedure_language: Avoid overly clinical or technical jargon unless audience is medical

content_preferences.other_preferences: Always distinguish between senior care and I/DD services in content and messaging
